# Infera

## Docs

- [About](https://docs.infera.org/about.md)
- [Chat Completions](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/chat-completions.md)
- [Check Node](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/check-node.md)
- [Daily Points Ep](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/daily-points-ep.md): Endpoint to fetch daily points for a specific node by making a request to the storage service.

:param request: Request payload containing node_name and last_days.
:return: List of daily points for the specified node fetched from the storage service.
- [Get Active Node Count](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-active-node-count.md)
- [Get Available Models](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-available-models.md)
- [Get Completion Time](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-completion-time.md)
- [Get Job](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-job.md)
- [Get Node Job Count](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-node-job-count.md)
- [Get Node Job History](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-node-job-history.md)
- [Get Points](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-points.md)
- [Get Result](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-result.md)
- [Get Total Job Count](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-total-job-count.md)
- [Get Unique Nodes](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/get-unique-nodes.md)
- [Network Stats](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/network-stats.md)
- [Node Jobs Stats](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/node-jobs-stats.md)
- [Node Model Mapping](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/node-model-mapping.md)
- [Node Points Ep](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/node-points-ep.md)
- [Ping Worker](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/ping-worker.md)
- [Register Node](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/register-node.md)
- [Signup](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/signup.md)
- [Submit Job](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/submit-job.md)
- [Update Model](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/update-model.md)
- [Update Result](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/update-result.md)
- [Worker Deregister](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/worker-deregister.md)
- [Worker Register](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/endpoint/worker-register.md)
- [Introduction](https://docs.infera.org/api-reference/introduction.md)
- [Challenges and Solutions](https://docs.infera.org/challenges.md)
- [Introduction](https://docs.infera.org/introduction.md): Begin your journey with Infera by following these simple steps to set up and run a node, discover use cases, and explore how the network operates.
- [Litepaper](https://docs.infera.org/litepaper.md)
- [Docker Setup](https://docs.infera.org/node/docker-setup.md): How to setup up and run an Infera Node inside of a Docker container.
- [Hardware Requirements](https://docs.infera.org/node/hardware-requirements.md)
- [Infera Lite](https://docs.infera.org/node/infera-lite.md): Infera Lite is an easy-to-use chrome extension UI that connects users to a decentralized AI inference network, allowing them to contribute their GPU for AI model inference.
- [Linking Your Node](https://docs.infera.org/node/link-node.md)
- [Linux](https://docs.infera.org/node/linux.md): Installing the Infera Node CLI program on Linux.
- [Mac OS](https://docs.infera.org/node/macos.md): Installing the Infera Node CLI program on Mac OS.
- [Managing Your Node](https://docs.infera.org/node/managing-node.md)
- [Running an Infera Node](https://docs.infera.org/node/quickstart.md): Quickstart to how to get an Infera node running on your device.
- [Windows](https://docs.infera.org/node/windows.md): Installing the Infera Node CLI program on Windows.
